extension.description: Sega Game Gear er en 8-bit håndholdt videospilkonsol udgivet i 1990. Mens den havde en baggrundsbelyst skærm i fuld farve og hurtig processor, blev batteriets levetid og store størrelse ofte kritiseret.
The Sega Game Gear is an 8-bit handheld video game console released in 1990. While it had a full-color backlit screen and fast processor, the battery life and large size were often criticized.
